testcase.name: products_api_medium should create a new product
products_api_medium should create a new products without the published field
testcase.classname: should create a new products without the published field

testcase.name: products_api_medium should fetch all the products
products_api_medium should fetch no products if there are not products stored
testcase.classname: should fetch no products if there are not products stored

testcase.name: products_api_medium should publish the product if all the constraints are met
testcase.classname: should publish the product if all the constraints are met

testcase.name: products_api_medium should publish the product and the data should be updated in the DB
testcase.classname: should publish the product and the data should be updated in the DB

testcase.name: products_api_medium should get 422 when MRP is less the price of the product
testcase.classname: should get 422 when MRP is less the price of the product

testcase.name: products_api_medium should get 422 when stock of the product is 0
testcase.classname: should get 422 when stock of the product is 0

testcase.name: products_api_medium should get 422 when both MRP is less the price of the product and stock of the product is 0
testcase.classname: should get 422 when both MRP is less the price of the product and stock of the product is 0

testcase.name: products_api_medium should get 405 for a put request to /products/:id
testcase.classname: should get 405 for a put request to /products/:id

testcase.name: products_api_medium should get 405 for a delete request to /products/:id
testcase.classname: should get 405 for a delete request to /products/:id
